title: Don't believe the hype.
review: Very unique, original movie. Acting was amazing for the most part, but the story sucked!

title: Ugh!!!
review: About as poorly acted, directed, and produced as a movie can get! Dumb to the core! Don't waste your time with this garbage. It's utter rubbish!

title: One of the greatest movies
review:
Possibly my favorite movie of all time.
Great cast, director, and acting. Storyline is great! A must watch!

title: Must watch!
review:
This is my very favorite movie of all time. 
Emotional, best acting. Eastwood's best film no doubt about it!

title: Not good
review: If you're into action/superhero movies with all the garbage CGI, and have 3 hours to waste, you might like it. Definitely not for me. Has a few decent jumpy parts, but not nearly enough 'scary' for my taste.
